titles.title: A bill to extend until January 1, 1997, the temporary suspension of duty on cyclosporine.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S2887-2888)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 3/15/1993--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to extend, through December 31, 1996, the existing suspension of duty on cyclosporine.
